Lin et al. housekeeping genes

housekeeping_lin_df.Rd

From https://academic.oup.com/gigascience/article/8/9/giz106/5570567, giz106_supplemental_table.xlsx.

Usage

housekeeping_lin_df

Format

housekeeping_lin

A data frame with 12986 rows (genes) and 3 columns:

Gene

Gene name

Stability.index

Stability index, the calculation the authors made to derive if a gene is "stable" or not

Housekeeping

Internal criteria defined as Stability.index larger that 0.8

Source

https://academic.oup.com/gigascience/article/8/9/giz106/5570567

Details

Using the criterion that Stability.index should be above 0.8, there are 759 housekeeping genes

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# How the data was loaded
df <- openxlsx::read.xlsx("giz106_supplemental_table.xlsx",
sheet = "human development")
colnames(df)[1] <- "Gene"
df$Housekeeping <- (df$Stability.index > 0.8)
df <- df[,c("Gene", "Stability.index", "Housekeeping")]
housekeeping_lin_df <- df
usethis::use_data(housekeeping_lin_df)

# To load
housekeeping_lin <- housekeeping_lin_df$Gene[housekeeping_lin_df$Housekeeping]
} # }
